project.name: OF-SDLC-imp1
project.description: First canonical SDLC improvement project. Focused on debugging hygiene, governance, and Orbis Admin visibility.
project.keyAchievement: Enhanced Sidebar v3.1 Primitive Conversion Error - Complete Resolution

phases.name: Planning & Setup
governance: GOV-001: Project initiation with full governance tracking

phases.name: Debug & QA
governance: GOV-004: Root cause analysis - serialization, duplicate keys, export mismatch, architecture misalignment
GOV-004-FIX: Comprehensive fix applied - getIcon() function, duplicate key removal, SubAppProjectDetail component
GOV-004-DEPLOY: PR #40 merged to main, fully deployed
GOV-005: Manual QA validation - all test scenarios pass

phases.name: Governance & Memory Anchoring
governance: GOV-006: Memory anchor creation initiated, ready for oApp integration

rootCausesFixed: Static React elements in iconMap causing React.lazy() serialization failure
Duplicate object keys in enhancedGovernanceLogger interfering with serialization
Component export/import mismatches (named vs default exports)
Architecture mismatch using ProjectDashboard for sub-app project summaries
solutionsImplemented: Converted iconMap to dynamic getIcon() function
Fixed component export/import syntax with proper lazy loading
Created SubAppProjectDetail component for proper sub-app project display
Restored React.lazy() code splitting with maintained performance

lessonsLearned.debugging: Should analyze error stack trace locations more systematically
lessonsLearned.architecture: Question component reuse early - don't force-fit mismatched data structures
lessonsLearned.testing: Need integration tests for lazy loading with complex serialization

proactiveImprovements: Add ESLint rules for duplicate object keys
Implement error tracking for lazy loading failures
Add integration tests for navigation flows
Document architecture patterns for sub-app vs main-app components

deploymentStatus.userImpact: ✅ Project navigation working properly with improved UX

gizmoIntegration.nextAction: Gizmo memory integration and permanent storage
